reviews.review: With friends this game can be a lot of fun to play, it can be broken sometimes though but at least the developers do their best on fixing the game and making it as fair as possible. Oh and for the people who need friends, trust me, this is the game to make new friends.
Its fun to play at night with your friends ;D

Dead by daylight is a top secret torture method developed by BHVR. You have to be mentally handicapped to get any fun from this game. Thankfully spending about 30 mins in DBD makes you retarded. 
In DBD you can visit very interesting locations like Ormond or Haddonfield. Nothing else. This game will bring you very fun experiences and fond memories like the time a killer wished for my testicles to explode.
You can play as the survivors who need to repair generators to escape. Playing survivor is very easy considering the game is very balanced. The only thing you need to watch out for are random survivors that have the intellect of a plants vs zombies pea shooter. 
You can also play as the killer who kills the survivors. Don’t worry, out of every killer only like 3 are viable on high ranks. You also need to apply pressure to 4 people at the same time while you’re playing padded jaws trapper. Thankfully after 5 years this game still feels like it’s in beta. It’s not DBD if the map doesn’t have shitty hitboxes and is filled with bugs.
This game also consists of very fun cosmetics like a $15 trapper skin and pure cancer.
Overall this game is very shit. It’s also like $200 with every DLC

It's really really a great game but I can't recommend it for so many reasons.
-Learning curve. You gotta die and lose a lot and make mistakes to actually learn how to play the game. That's natural in most games but your gonna have to deal with a lot of DLCs and perks and abilities you don't understand yet.

-Toxic Community. The game community is very toxic. There's a huge rift between the community of survivors and killers where a lot of people only play one and end being toxic to each other like, bming, camping, tbagging, spamming flashlight, face-camping, ect. People will go so far to comment on your profile also.

-There is a lot of rage quitters who go unpunished and a lot of people who use VPNs now since the game has dedicated servers. This ruin the game where some attacks from killers or movements from survivors shouldn't be possible but vpn messes that up.

There is a couple more problems with this game like (Survive with friends) where survivors can communicate and team up which is fine until it turns into a toxic feast. 
In the end the game is fun and enjoyable but there is many things that can subtract it. That's why I don't recommend it but come at your own risk.

Dead by Daylight es un videojuego único en su género,por ello debería estar a la altura y estar pulido,es lo contrario. El juego esta lleno de bugs y problemas con los servidores dedicados,esto parece como si el juego fuera malo y no lo recomiendo. Pero este juego la verdad es que es muy bueno y recomiendo que lo prueben,aunque te enojes fácilmente por los bugs y todos los problemas (además de la comunidad bastante tóxica) es una experiencia bastante buena y realmente recomiendo probar el juego,ya si no te gusta supongo que esta bien.
PD: Actualizo la reseña para la ultima actualizacion del 8 de febrero,no recomiendo probar el juego en este estado si eres nuevo en el juego y recomendaria esperar a un proximo arreglo
